text: re patterson; ex parte taylor  constitutional law (cth)

respondent invited prosecutor to make representations to her to have the decision revoked under s 501c(4) of migration act 1958 (cth)
only ground for revocation was that prosecutor passed the character test

whether misunderstanding amounted to a constructive failure of jurisdiction. immigration
